casename: Liwen Holdings Pte Ltd v Ng Ker San and Another and Other Actions
counsel: Sim Lin Piah (Toh Tan & Partners) for the plaintiff; Lee Mun Hooi and Liew Chen Chen (Lee Mun Hooi & Co) for the defendants
tags-parsed: Land/Caveats/effect of caveat-Adverse possession/Whether adverse possession acquired by 1st March 1994/Failure to lodge caveat against disputed plot of land before lapsing of caution/Whether such interest can be defeated by bona fide purchaser's interest under Land Titles Act (Cap 157, 1994 Ed)
